title: Heart of Five
description: Average is how Megan Little would describe her life until her twenty-fifth birthday. Her body starts to change like a countdown clock heading for zero. When her research on the transformation proves futile, she makes a desperate decision and travels north to investigate a supernatural reason for what's happening.  On the way, a chance encounter leaves her car vandalized, forcing her to stay the night in a small, tourist town.  Five men step in to help Megan only to open up more questions in her search for the truth.  ***Reverse Harem Serial.
author: L.A. Kirk
